column1:
"O menino está de pé.[sound:oddcast-59177fcc-ebdfee67-144cbb96-ba33a823-a9a72f90.mp3]
"

"O menino limpa o tapete.[sound:oddcast-85c6b4fd-b20603dc-3a70bafd-80d26a50-31ae3254.mp3]
"

"O menino segura o tubo do aspirador de pó.[sound:oddcast-548a244b-0a4d0eb2-183c0a07-23075525-8c3df519.mp3]
"

"O homem está sentado no sofá.[sound:oddcast-10a14f0b-05d6beb7-9ea35cb1-cd3533b2-b467d0cc.mp3]
"

"O homem usa o telefone celular.[sound:oddcast-591e383d-4ae480ed-360a3384-52f02b65-451e5f2a.mp3]
"

"O homem navega na internet enquanto o menino trabalha.[sound:oddcast-2760b2c7-8897e265-1d8c630b-784e1103-52678dab.mp3]
"
column2:
"Der Mann surft im Internet, während der Junge arbeitet.[sound:oddcast-18423b25-4b80570c-930d29da-d44a5b59-41a032ce.mp3]
"

column1:
"O menino est de p limpando o piso.[sound:oddcast-ce376a88-ddce5f15-b8b81133-2468c54d-4e607d67.mp3]
"

"O menino usa uma vassoura lilás.[sound:oddcast-3e802469-7e4295fa-1d64a071-9a97d462-08a9a48b.mp3]
"

"O homem está sentado no sofá, abaixado, limpando o piso.[sound:oddcast-4dabab3a-b07a533c-fa65387c-3e97eb7d-5afaf9bf.mp3]
"
column2:
"Der Mann sitzt auf der Sofa, bückt sich und putzt den Fußboden.[sound:oddcast-fa64cb56-2f9ac322-4e3d9e6e-498bb2ff-13d89e1d.mp3]
"

column1:
"O homem usa uma esponja rosa para limpar o piso.[sound:oddcast-79ec72c4-01f85d14-02db7293-d0319d27-a2935c41.mp3]
"
column2:
"Der Mann putzt den Boden mit einem rosa Schwamm.[sound:oddcast-f785eb3e-ef82aa6a-34abdb7f-f75a49b5-340f67da.mp3]
"

column1:
"O aquecedor está perto do sofá.[sound:oddcast-2e289065-504b06b5-f37599b9-d786f2eb-d3bf6d55.mp3]
"
column2:
"Die Heizung befindet sich in der Nähe des Sofas.[sound:oddcast-bb2feb26-08d94cc7-1242d598-6a1f41ce-dce16366.mp3]
"

column1:
"O aquecedor está entre a cortina e a parede.[sound:oddcast-6dfc85af-c5ac8db6-d396f025-19e330a6-530c86ac.mp3]
"
column2:
"Die Heizung befindet sich zwischen dem Gardine und der Wand.[sound:oddcast-2c5cee01-714c560d-17ec8ab2-2211647d-df9652ae.mp3]
"

column1:
"A cozinha está atrás do sofá do lado esquerdo.[sound:oddcast-9aceebb7-424531ff-f23a38e3-31bccd71-da7a1c66.mp3]
"
column2:
"Die Küche befindet sich links hinter dem Sofa.[sound:oddcast-21bfa8be-58dcc60e-20cfb2c3-34215842-ddcb19c9.mp3]
"

column1:
"O armário de cozinha tem duas portas de vidro.[sound:oddcast-1b1c0654-147a82c5-c7716211-5ba3efa8-eadc1d3d.mp3]
"

"Vemos pratos e copos dentro do armário de cozinha.[sound:oddcast-dd5c0f90-a5ce9a59-15bf2fad-814d67e7-2c9d562b.mp3]
"

"Tem duas lâmpadas penduradas no teto.[sound:oddcast-383a029c-aff8664c-c633b383-792aff6d-a4f6e19e.mp3]
"

"As lâmpadas estão ligadas.[sound:oddcast-7b4e4aad-599530a6-1005458f-4518352d-29ce6521.mp3]
"

"Debaixo do armário de parede tem papél de parede, ou talvez azulejos.[sound:oddcast-9e0d5a58-20edde3f-d6a59f0c-4d15b49f-5eade80d.mp3]
"
column2:
"Unter dem Wandschrank befindet sich eine Tapete oder vielleicht Fliesen.[sound:oddcast-9d4551d5-7d89acd8-e8e0bc69-279559ab-5016dce9.mp3]
"

column1:
"Vemos tres velas no suporte de velas.[sound:oddcast-c0fe3b95-79e596a0-1bd75554-b9c76b83-e3ad7bf2.mp3]
"

"Vemos a grade do ar condicionado sobre o armário de cozinha.[sound:oddcast-ae5f5019-bda5fa62-031e59d9-33128d18-d09a81c6.mp3]
"

"A sala de estar tem uma outra grade do ar condicionado.[sound:oddcast-a3cecd20-58ef9e50-2095edfc-6b562062-a06cc3b9.mp3]
"
